author: vexx32
body:
## PR Summary

Retrieving the value of `$PSDefaultParameterValues` and then setting that back to `$global:PSDefaultParameterValues` may, in some cases, cause an inherited value to be suddenly copied to global scope unexpectedly.

We probably should avoid mismatching our scopes in this manner.

    - **OR**

title: Use Consistent Scope for $PSDefaultParameterValues Recommendation
